Class ProxyChannelInboundHandler

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public class ProxyChannelInboundHandler
extends ServerChannelInboundHandler<RadiusPacket>
    ServerChannelInboundHandler that allows any RadiusPacket type and adds lifecycle methods.
